title: Update landing page theme to falling autumn leaves at sunset

requirements.text: Update the homepage visual theme to evoke “falling autumn leaves, sunset time” using a cohesive warm palette (amber/orange/copper/burgundy) and matching surfaces, borders, and accents across the landing header, hero, highlights, upload, gallery, dialogs, and footer while keeping all existing functionality unchanged.

quotes: Make the theme of the home page like “ falling of autumn leaves , sun set time “ kind of

acceptanceCriteria: No backend changes are required to achieve the theme update.
The overall app color system reads as warm autumn sunset (no blue/purple-forward palette).
Buttons, cards, alerts, borders, and hover states remain accessible with sufficient contrast in both light and dark mode.
Existing page structure and behaviors remain intact: header navigation scroll, hero CTAs scroll, upload flow, gallery list, and photo viewer dialog all still work.

requirements.text: Update the hero section styling to match the autumn-sunset theme by adjusting overlays/gradients and any hero text emphasis colors so the background and content feel like a warm sunset scene with drifting leaves, without changing the hero’s existing CTA behavior.

quotes: Make the theme of the home page like “ falling of autumn leaves , sun set time “ kind of

acceptanceCriteria: Hero background overlay and gradients are updated to warm sunset tones (e.g., amber-to-burgundy) and do not wash out the headline/CTAs.
Hero headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons remain readable on common screen sizes.
CTA buttons still smooth-scroll to #upload-section and #gallery-section as they do currently.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Respect the existing single-page layout in frontend/src/App.tsx (do not remove upload/gallery functionality).
Do not route static hero images through the backend; keep them in frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Adding albums, categories, or new gallery features.
Changing backend photo storage APIs or data schema.
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.

edits: Convert the existing hero background to an autumn sunset with subtle falling leaves motif and warm grain (hero-collage-bg.dim_1600x900.png > hero-collage-bg.dim_1600x900.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer a warm autumn-sunset visual theme (falling leaves at sunset) for the homepage.
